mapper.select: select e.ename,d.dname,d.loc from spring_employment e ,spring_department d where e.deptno = d.deptno and e.empno = #{value};
select e.empno,e.ename,d.deptno,d.dname from spring_employment e ,spring_department d where e.deptno(+) = d.deptno
select d.deptno,d.dname,e.emp_count from (select deptno,count(*) as emp_count from spring_employment group by deptno) e ,spring_department d where e.deptno = d.deptno

select d.deptno,d.dname,nvl(e.emp_count,0) as emp_count from (select deptno,count(*) as emp_count from spring_employment group by deptno) e ,spring_department d where e.deptno(+) = d.deptno order by d.deptno
